website_summaries.verdict: Buy the Bonavita Metropolitan coffee maker for its low price and excellent drip, but slow drinkers should save up for a thermal carafe model.
pros: The Bonavita Metropolitan brews excellent coffee for a very reasonable price
It's simple to use, compact and easy to clean
cons: It doesn't have a thermal carafe
Coffee in its glass carafe cools quickly

customer_reviews.title: Another winner from Bonavita
customer_reviews.text: After our last Bonavita finally gave up the ghost, I felt like an old friend had died. I assuaged my sorrow by researching coffee makers and stumbled across this new model. One month in, I am really happy I pulled the trigger on this coffee maker. The pre-infusion step is a really nice feature, and I prefer the flat-bottom brewing basket to the conical one on our old brewer. If you want a really solid coffee maker, but you still don’t want to drop the coin on a Technivorm, pick up this Bonavita.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hujet

customer_reviews.title: Solid machine (for awhile) with terrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: This machine made great tasting, hot coffee for 6 months. It then malfunctioned and numerous attempts to clean it were fruitless. It’s just broken. I submitted a warranty claim on their website, left numerous voicemails over the course of two weeks, and have yet to receive any response whatsoever from Bonavita. I will update if I get a response, but beware that the company doesn’t appear to care if their products fail.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT listen to bad reviews about the filter basket being too loose
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT listen to bad reviews about the filter basket being too loose, you have to push it all the way in until you here a snap. Then it is locked in place and is NOT loose at all. DO listen to this review; This coffee maker is simple, easy to use, and makes hot coffee very quickly. Also the water is distributed over the coffee grounds evenly. What more can you ask for ? It also looks great, seems sturdy and well made, compact and grips the counter well so it's not sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Decent but Pricey
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker can brew an excellent pot of coffee. However, it is difficult to get consistent results. It also clogs easily and after 3 months of daily use it was struggling to brew 8 cups without stopping. I ran a pot with the descaling powder (included), then one with vinegar, then one with just water. Now, it is close to the original brewing speed and the coffee is tasting better so I may try more regular deep cleanings (maybe monthly). For the price, I had hoped for more. However, it is a much better coffee maker than the Mr. Coffee I had used for years and the coffee tastes better.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this coffee maker to friends and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Bonavita 1901PW and it made a delightful cup of coffee, smooth, rich deep flavor, not bitter. I used Gevalia Columbian, using 3 coffee scoops for the six cup mark. I had no problem with the basket staying in place as others stated as this model clearly has a catch that locks the basket in place. The 40 minute warmer plate is not an issue with me since keeping coffee heated for too long dramatically alters the flavor. There was a double beep when brewing stopped and almost immediately the coffee stopped dripping. I would recommend this coffee maker to friends and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: clinck

customer_reviews.title: No nonsense machine. Just great coffee!
customer_reviews.text: No nonsense machine. It doesn't tell time and weather; doesn't talk to you and operate every device in your home; it doesn't re-order staples . . . It simply makes great coffee!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Algozer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t make a better,useable,, sturdy glass carafe?  Then go into another business!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted year and a half. Cleaned it religiously with recommended powder. The carafe cracked....patched with gorilla glue. Disappointed! Lousy carafe! Thermal doesn’t keep hot! Next one will be a BUNN! They at least make a carafe that isn’t paper thin!
customer_reviews.author: anne fischer

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Makes great coffee! Looks good, even though it is plastic. Carafe is a pita to clean if you have big hands. Permanent filters that fit properly seem impossible to find... ****MAY 2020 Update*** I can no longer recommend this product, pending customer service response, thus the downgrade to three stars. coffee maker either shuts down midbrew, or fails to brew at all. When it does brew, completely, the coffee is not very hot. Great coffee maker, until it isn’t. Worked properly for about 7 months. Shorter lived than a 15 brewer from the drug store. This is unacceptable IMO. Let’s see if the company makes it right. Will update...
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Second calamity was the charm
customer_reviews.text: Lifting the pot out can contact the basket overhead, flipping it into instability, dumping all the grounds. Second go at this, as I attempted to nudge the basket back with the pot, with not much force at all, the pot itself shattered, raining coffee and broken glass onto me and my floor. The pot will not keep the coffee hot, and it is fairy fragile. As above. Great little pot, good flavor, but will not hold onto its basket. I'm switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks out of the return window and it won't brew a liter of coffee without turning it off and on again. Does about half of the water and shuts down. Need to restart to finish. Disappointed in this highly rated product.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Deschane

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best out there
customer_reviews.text: I looked at alot of options and besides the very expensive Technivorm, this one is simply the best! It measured 199-201 F degrees throughout the brewing process. If you want a no nonsense coffee maker, with a pre-infusion option, meets the SCA guidelines, and brews a superb cup of joe...look no further.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating Plastic Smell and Taste
customer_reviews.text: The Bonavita BV1901PW coffee brewer did everything very well - the temperature for brewing was consistently above 195 deg F, everything is easy to clean, and it's very simple to use for any brew size 6-8 cups. The one star is because of the nauseating plastic smell and taste that just did not go away even after running the unit through several plain water cycles and a vinegar cycle. I threw away the first pot of coffee, the second was no better, left a nauseating plastic smell in the kitchen and plastic taste in the coffee. No matter how good everything else is, if the result is undrinkable, it gets a 'fail' in my book. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: rtb

customer_reviews.title: A great coffee maker with a short electrical cord
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a fan on simplicity when it comes to making coffee, this is a great machine. There is one button to press to start making great tasting coffee. There is no clock to set. No “sleep timer”. Just 1 button. There is only one downside to this machine. The cord to plug it in is 24”. For my countertop, that limits where the machine will live. It needs to be close to an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: 1) Coffee is weak because the machine is inefficient at extracting much flavor from a given amount of ground coffee. If you have to load twice as much coffee to get the same amount of flavor as a cheap-o coffee maker, what's the point? 2) Carafe is fragile, and if broken is expensive to replace. Bonavita as a company is not helpful over the phone nor do they care if replacement parts are available. Pre-infusion mode is a joke. Machine probably hesitates an extra 10 seconds before resuming the brew compared to the normal mode, as if that does anything for "Bloom."
customer_reviews.author: George P.

customer_reviews.title: Every single one of these dies after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, every single person I know who has purchased a bonavita has had their unit die almost exactly two years after purchase. The worst part is, this model had the warranty reduced from Bonavita's standard 2 year warranty to just 1 year, because they are AWARE of the problem they just don't care. AVOID! These are made to fail so you have to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep coffee warm
customer_reviews.text: Although this is easy to clean and easy to use it doesn't heat the water very hot and therefore the coffee cools super fast. The warmer stays on for only 40 minutes and you must put the carafe lid on to keep what little warmth the coffee has. If you brew an entire pot, don't expect the coffee to be warm for the last pour. I am keeping it until I find a more suitable one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Maker, Bad Carafe
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker works great. Really easy to use and I love that filter basket is separate from the carafe. My only problem with this is that the carafe it comes with looks great but is really fragile. After two weeks, I tapped it on the faucet while washing and it broke and cut me. I ended up buying a cheap black and decker carafe that doesn't perfectly fit but works good enough. You'll get good coffee at the cost of being super gentle or replacing the carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Baldovino

customer_reviews.title: Simple, only one button. Makes excellent coffee!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Bonavita! It’s elegant, simple, and it makes an amazing cup of coffee. The pour over feature is awesome for really fresh grounds. It soaks the grounds and lets them bloom, then finishes the brew. We love the glass carafe and the hanging filter basket. Would definitely buy again!! This is a high class brewer like the Moccamaster without the high price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Pelanda

customer_reviews.title: Glass carafe will break easily.  You will not get a useful life from this carafe.
customer_reviews.text: I removed the glass carafe from the dishwasher and it broke at the handle. It was not stuck or under any kind of pressure that I could tell. Please note this is a fragile item and I would not plan on getting a useful life from it. The coffee maker makes good coffee though I feel that cone filters brew better coffee than basket filters. For more than one reason, I would stay away from this unit.
customer_reviews.author: BearsStink

customer_reviews.title: Beware- this will not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in August 2018. I loved it, until it suddenly started shutting off seconds into brewing last week. I contacted bonavita customer service, who offered no recommendation for repairs and simply told me the product was out of warranty, so there is nothing they can do. After doing some digging online, it seems to be a common issue with this model. While not terribly expensive, I’ve had coffee machines half the price that outlived this one significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Megan L

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful...Until It Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this coffee maker, except one thing. It has stopped working 22 months after it was purchased. All of a sudden, it has gone silent. The water pump has died. It is now of no use and no doubt expensive to repair. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Saadi

customer_reviews.title: Replacement glass carafe not available
customer_reviews.text: Undoubtedly makes great coffee. Unfortunately, I broke the glass carafe, and Bonavita and it’s vendor, Kitchen Kapers, is out of stock of the replacement carafe. Bonavita customer service sent me an email that it would not be available for at least 6 weeks. Ridiculous planning on their part
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee when it feels like working
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of light daily use (1 brew per day...4 cups every morning) it began to work funny. It made a weird (¿electrical?) noise when turned on. Few days later the machine came to a constant mode in which the noise remains but it will only brew if you are really really lucky. Sad to see such a great coffee maker fail every morning (it does make a pretty amazing cup of coffee). Warranty will not solve this easily. They will fight you on your claim.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Barragan

customer_reviews.title: made a couple dozen pots before failing
customer_reviews.text: This brewer made a couple dozen pots of very decent coffee before failing. It mostly boils off the water without dispensing it to the pot. Creates a ton of humidity and condensation on any cabinets, walls, or windows nearby. A coffee brewer should make coffee if nothing else, and this one fails to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great service! Great coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee machine. It died on me just last week and I contacted bonavita about it. They asked a couple of questions about my machines and sent me a new one at no charge! (Even though it is out of warranty) Great company and service. Will buy from them again for my coffee needs 😁
customer_reviews.author: Sazcube

customer_reviews.title: The best auto-drip coffee maker...
customer_reviews.text: Best drip coffee maker on the market, hands down! You can see when you remove the basket how the sprinkler head evenly saturates all the grounds. I especially like the “pre-soak” feature you can program to allow the fresh grounds to “bloom”! It really does make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: retmico

customer_reviews.title: lasted 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several $20 drip coffee makers that have lasted over 10 years.I paid much more for this one in an attempt to get a great cup of coffee.The coffee is not any better tasting and the fact that it quit working in 1 year is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Smart Barista Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I used to work in a fancy coffee shop so I am very particular about my coffee. For years, my main way of making my morning cup was a Chemex with the beans weighed out, ground on a burr grinder, and the water measured. After getting a little tired of all that work every morning, I bought this brewer to save myself some work in the morning. It brews a great cup and the temperature control on the water is far better than what I could do on my electric kettle. If you want something that can pre program, spend more money. But if you want a quality brewer that replicates the Chemex motions this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Coffee has just gone up to coffee house!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee make is super easy to move into and maintain. Cleaning is a breeze and the book is Very educational. I'm now my husband's personal Batista! Thank you for creating such a wonderful product for home use! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: RAS

customer_reviews.title: The BEST coffee maker I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is a work horse! I drink a LOT of coffee. High end, gourmet coffee. And this ENTRY LEVEL Bona Vita delivers, every morning! This company is renowned in the coffee world for their machines. Spend a little more and you'll get something a tad more stylish, but if you're looking for great coffee without too many frills on a budget, then this is your new best friend.
customer_reviews.author: paytonitforward

customer_reviews.title: Broken Carafe One Month In
customer_reviews.text: We ignored the reviews that noted the carafe breaks very easily. One month in and out of nowhere the carafe has cracked. We can't find a replacement anywhere. The brewer itself produces a very quality cup of coffee, but I think Bonavita has some other offerings that will work out better for you longterm. I wouldn't recommend investing in this one. We are unfortunately past the return window, and seem to be out of luck on locating a replacement carafe. Oh well, I guess I'll just keep working on my Kalita technique.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS COFFEEMAKER
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is going I the trash. The coffee tastes great, easy machine to use BUT... the filter slides over two small lips of plastic on each side. There is a little flap of rubber that is supposed to hold the filter in. IT DOESN’T I have had grounds everywhere multiple times. I have tried sliding the handle different directions to keep from hitting it when I pull the pot out but I am not the only one using this coffee pot. My family of 4 hates it. So after two months We are getting rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Finkenbinder

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for about 4 months now and while I'm no coffee connoisseur, it doesn't seem that the taste is any better than my $20 Mr Coffee when using the same coffee and water ratios. The Bonivita is loud and often results in a luke warm cup unless the carafe sits for 10 minutes to warm up after the cycle is finished. The carafe does not sit flat on the warmer so it is inefficient. The filter basket is easy to dislodge when pulling the carafe out which spills hot grinds on the counter. Overall this is very cheaply made for an $80 plastic appliance. It's hard to see where the value is.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee - Unit leaks
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a bad unit, however I can't leave water in the reservoir because multiple occasions the water leaks onto the counter. About a cup every 24 hours. Other than that, the coffee is delicious. reading some other reviews though I'm nervous of how long this pot will last.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Orecchio

customer_reviews.title: HOT coffee
customer_reviews.text: Adding to previous review: Emailed customer support about a replacement/back-up pot and actually received a personal response with the info I need! So pleasant to deal with real people. Make a pot each morning with freshly ground beans, love that I have a few cups of HOT coffee to start the day. Easy to use, easy to clean. Concerned I will bang the glass pot against the counter and break it one of these days, so will order a back up pot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best coffee brewer I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: When our cheap Mr. Coffee finally bit the dust, I knew i wanted a high quality, reliable brewer. Enter Bonavita. After I did tons of research, I'd consistently see Bonavita brewers on top 10 or best brewers lists. The showerhead design saturates the grounds evenly and works like charm. I really love the pre infusion mode, which is what use most of the time. It has worked flawless and delivers a great cup of coffee every time. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Herrell

customer_reviews.title: have to send it back, it's broken, I ...
customer_reviews.text: have to send it back, it's broken, I get a strong taste of plastic or chemical. I've rinsed through it dozens of times and it's still the same
customer_reviews.author: John Gavares

customer_reviews.title: Luke warm
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. It's simple. It brews a good cup of coffee. Like the other reviewers said, the carafe and warmer just can't provide you a hot cup after the 1st pour. Disappointed and the return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: David Storrs

customer_reviews.title: Don't get caught up in the hype
customer_reviews.text: This machine really does not live up to the hype that has been boasted about the internet about the flavor this machine will deliver. It is in my sincerest opinion, that the flavor this machine delivers is no better than any other machine I have tried. Lots of hype, no convenience features, and no improvement in flavor. I just wish I could return it based on the fact that the advertisement for this machine is just a marketing gimmick that I lost money on.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: It made good coffee, not great mind you
customer_reviews.text: It made good coffee, not great mind you, but very good coffee for the price. I returned it because I was hoping to automate the system to brew in the morning for me when I wake up, but due to an odd brew switch choice, it would be more work than it was worth.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan slater brabec

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this coffee maker! Produces consistently good coffee. Now, it is worth buying well roasted coffee as I can get the most flavor out of it. However; this is Bonita's middle of the road unit and the sacrifice with this one is no stainless carafe option to help your wonderfully brewed coffee stay hot so you will have to use a thermos or reheat extra in the micro wave. Not ideal ,but worth it for the great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: It's affordable. It makes a good cup of coffee. I found a reusable cloth filter that works pretty well so I'm happy with that. I wish I'd spent a little more to get a similar brewer with an insulated carafe and timer. I don't know if that would really be better or not.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for SCA Gold Certified Brewer
customer_reviews.text: This brewer meets all SCA Gold Cup certifications, and is probably the best value on the market. This is not a fancy brewer whatsoever, but is perfect for the minimalist that wants quality coffee with ease of use. The preinfusion feature is great, and the warming plate at 45 minutes is perfect for coffee freshness.
customer_reviews.author: meredith Redding

customer_reviews.title: Better than Krups, Mr Coffee, Braun, and the rest.
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker ever. Void of all the glossy features that raters love, but was designed to make great coffee...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Perfect hot cups of coffee every time. No complex extra features that never get used. Turn on, enjoy, turn off. Glass carafe is very well made and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis Hessler

customer_reviews.title: poor design and quality
customer_reviews.text: This does make a hot cup of coffee and pretty good. The down side is far greater, it beeps to tell you it is finished, you pull the pot and it keep dripping on the hot plate, and you have to put the lid in to keep it warm, extra step. The glass pot is paper thin, and no chance of replacement. The whole thing is thin and cheap plastic. Save your money for something better.
customer_reviews.author: hoss

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on 5/22/19 and have used it every day since I received. I love this coffee maker as it brews a really good cup of coffee. This design is a lot better than the previous Bonavita BV1800SS version that I had. You can pour from this glass carafe without the lid. WINNING
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good coffee! acceptable tradeoff for lower price.
customer_reviews.text: Brews a darn good pot of coffee. I mean really good. (I grind fresh also) Only drawback is the carafe is fragile and has no markings. So if, like me, you like to use it to fill water you have to eyeball the amount. Being that this is one of the lower price points for a 'golden cup standard' coffee maker, I'd say the tradeoff is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not as hot as description
customer_reviews.text: Simple coffee maker I was hoping by the description it had that the coffee would be hotter than it is, simple design It's ok I wouldn't by again
customer_reviews.author: shirley canino

customer_reviews.title: Cool look but could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like this coffee maker. It has clean lines and a modern look. The only thing I don’t like is there are no line markers on the carafe so the first few times you have to guess. It also does not have a warmer.
customer_reviews.author: C. Purcell

customer_reviews.title: makes good coffee
customer_reviews.text: it has the pre brew cycle, so the ground coffee can bloom before the coffee is brewed. Makes a big difference. It also is a nice looking design.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my mother one of these coffeemakers and liked it so much, I got one for myself. I get locally roasted coffee and grind it myself, and I have to say the taste is just what I was looking for. For those groggy in the morning, the controls couldn't be simpler. Just press one button and that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last. Weak customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Made a great cup of coffee for 2 years (far too short for the price) then it stopped dispensing water. Reached out to the company and was given no information about repair, just that it was out of warranty. Buyer beware, once something goes wrong you'll be on your own. Will not touch another Bonavita product no matter how good the coffee is.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! No spring valves, no weird plastic parts. It brews great coffee fast.
customer_reviews.author: Erb

customer_reviews.title: 11 months old and it's crapped out
customer_reviews.text: wow, $73.03 and less than a year old and already it's all done- doesn't pump water to the filter- what a piece of junk. I'll try to call someone at Bonavita but I'm not holding my breath
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting coffee, classy design, poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Treat it with kid gloves. Makes good coffee and looks nice on the counter, but I've had to replace both a carafe and the basket due to cracks from minor bumps. If anything else breaks I will look elsewhere for my next coffeemaker. I would not buy this coffee maker again, although I do enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Part replacement woes
customer_reviews.text: I don't care how decent of a machine it is for the money. If you break a carafe on a machine, and the reseller is out of stock on new carafes (which are exorbitantly priced at 30+shipping), maybe the manufacturer could offer a little more help with replacements? The machine is still being sold new, getting a new carafe shouldn't be a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Alec Meen

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I expected
customer_reviews.text: My friend suggested this coffee pot for better tasting and extra hot coffee because of the brewing system. From my experience, I did not notice that it was any better than a lower priced coffee pot. I ended up not keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Simple but makes great coffee.
customer_reviews.text: It's simple and only does one thing. Make great coffee. I do wish it was an on off switch instead of a momentary switch. That way it would stay on longer.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good simple coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. Only coffee does not stay very hot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee maker after reading other positive reviews. I can say that I am very happy with this product. It looks good and makes great coffee. Very easy to use with helpful tips in instructions. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gipson

customer_reviews.title: TROY NY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 6/10/18 and kind of disappointed because the coffee pot is starting to smell like its burning. I loved everything about but sad. Looking for another coffee pot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement carafe is $30
customer_reviews.text: Broke carafe and replacement carafe is $30 Had I known this I would not have purchased this. But makes delicious coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Simple to use and clean. Makes a great tasting cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: pepsiman

customer_reviews.title: Great coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: It works better than expected. Easy to use and maintain. Looks very sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald T. Bannach

customer_reviews.title: Easy and delicious
customer_reviews.text: The coffee tastes great and it is so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: MommyPT

customer_reviews.title: Leaking and shutting off after only 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked the coffeemaker for the 4 months it actually worked, then it started leaking from the bottom and shutting off. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to buy one of these?
customer_reviews.text: This product performs as advertised and makes an excellent tasting pot of coffee in seven minutes or less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Brew
customer_reviews.text: Brews good coffee, when it says it is done brewing it still drips.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Larker

customer_reviews.title: Glass carafe
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and the coffee however, the glass carafe is thin and cheap. It cracked and this has never happened over all the years I've been using coffee makers! Get something with a better carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Eoline Killough

customer_reviews.title: coffee doesn’t stay hot
customer_reviews.text: the coffee doesn’t stay hot. machine turns off too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coffee, Beautiful Look
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker, brews an amazing cup and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Broderick Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great tasting cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: Right temp, quick to brew. I wish it was available in a 10-12 cup
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing -- 2 brand new units both broken.
customer_reviews.text: I have to mark this 1 star -- was unable to test product as it arrived damaged twice. Both arrived new, but one the grinds tray handle was cracked off and the replacement unit from amazon the carafe arrived cracked. I might try a third time, but it is clear that this is just a cheaper version of the more expensive brother -- while this is obvious from the plastic parts what is disappointing is the quality of the product has taken a huge hit. 2 different units shipped fine (no damage on either boxes) the unit arrived in complete brand new packaging, but due to the poor quality of plastic and glass the bonavita still arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Guaquil

customer_reviews.title: Good saturation on grounds without blowing them all over the filter causing a mess like my old one. Doesn't keep coffee hot long
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged great with no damage. Makes a great cup of coffee. Easy to use and clean. I wish the warmer stayed on longer as I sometimes take longer to finish pot when it's just me. Coffee is better if used sooner but I don't mind it an hour later if I start with good coffee. It stays hot for about 25 minutes and warm for 20 more.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Eller

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting cup of Joe that falls short on functionality
customer_reviews.text: Makes a good tasting cup, but compared to my previous Oxo Brain 12 cup (died, don't buy their product) the coffee does not come out near hot enough after you put cream in it. If you drink it black it's about the perfect temp. I am returning this unit because of how annoying it is to keep clean due to the unit leaking water in the pot. The photo in this review is two hours after I made coffee and had already cleaned it out (filter was still in the machine for fairness.). Never had these issues with the oxo and even though it makes a good cup, too many compromises not to spend more and get a better unit.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Malto

customer_reviews.title: Validated performance. Damn good coffee.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is amazing. I read a lot of complaints in other reviews about water temp and the warming plate not keeping coffee warm and poor quality, however that was not my experience. I measured the temperature and it maxed at 204 deg F in the basket. Coffee in the pot was 185-175 deg on the warming plate over 40 minutes. Exceptional performance, simple clean design and nice build quality. Most of all, it makes damn good coffee. I did a lot of research before purchasing our new coffee maker and after three weeks of this coffee, I couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brown

customer_reviews.title: makes great coffee but steam from unit damaged ny kitchen cabinets
customer_reviews.text: Coffee flavor is wonderful BUT --- the unit produces huge amount of steam from the top which rose up to my upper cabinets ( I had it on the kitchen counter where I have always had my coffee makers) and damaged the finish. I have in on the center island but it is not as convenient and is somewhat unsightly. This is a shame because it makes great coffee....
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Stop and pour feature would be nice. It does make a good cup of coffee
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months, It only made a 1/2 pot then stopped brewing. Did that twice. I used the cleaner and it is working again. Too sensitive. Stop and pour feature would be nice. It does make a good cup of coffee, better than the average coffee maker and it is hotter. I wouldn’t spend $100 on a Bonivita again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Lukewarm coffee requires microwave.  Until you break the carafe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 6 months ago to replace one with a stainless steel carafe that I used a couple of years before it died. Bonavita’s make great coffee. However, this one doesn’t keep the coffee warm. The second cup needs 30 seconds in the microwave. The glass carafe is pretty and nice to use. But it is glass and has to be cleaned every day. I broke it yesterday washing it out in the sink. So, I ordered another one with a steel carafe rather than trying to replace the glass.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Good pre-infusion machine
customer_reviews.text: It's as simple as this: If one believes that the pre-infusion method of brewing coffee results in the best coffee taste, then this coffee maker is good while also inexpensive. This model is for smaller quantities. The flow of the coffee cannot be stopped. I brew two cups at a time. I am careful with my stuff. This coffee machine has been great for me. - The loss of coffee aroma because of the nitrogen injection in order to preserve the aroma, well that is another story.
customer_reviews.author: alius

customer_reviews.title: What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm returning this coffee maker tomorrow, what a bummer! I wanted to replace my old Mr Coffee and get something that would make really hot coffee and a more flavorful one as well. This was no better than my Mr. Coffee that I payed $15 for, using a coupon. This maker also off gassed a lot of plastic smell. All I can say good about it is the carafe is nice, but looks like one little bump and it's a goner. I'm not a coffee snob, I'd just like a good "hot" cup of coffee. Are there any coffee makers that can do that and not cost $300? Back to my old Mr. Coffee for now....
customer_reviews.author: john kepford

customer_reviews.title: Drip basket overflows
customer_reviews.text: We liked the stainless steel-carafe version so much that we bought this less-expensive model for our second home. Big mistake. For any amount more than 4 cups the basket overflows, letting grounds spill into the carafe and creating a mess on the shower head. How this design flaw managed to slip though is a mystery. Using coffee that is ground coarser-than-normal helps some, but then of course more coffee is needed and the taste is not the same. My advice is to avoid this model, no matter the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wergin

customer_reviews.title: The carafe will break... it’s just a matter of when.
customer_reviews.text: Makes a fine cup of coffee but the carafe is fragile AF. Handle broke off in my hand while cleaning. Not sure if this is reason enough to pass but keep in mind that a replacement carafe costs close to $30, which is approaching half the cost of the entire unit. I find that quite ridiculous. I am now using an old carafe from a Mr Coffee which does t fit nicely in the warming tray until I decide what to do about this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: unit turns off in aprox. 20mins
customer_reviews.text: well it makes great coffee as bonavita's do but after you brew a pot, if you like your coffee hot you must drink it within 20-30 mins because the unit turns its self off which makes the heating plate also turn off. Terrible design! I bought this to replace my old bonavita. this thing is getting donated and I bought a $20 coffee machine, the wife is much happier..... advise, buy a different unit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee machine, carafe replacements are $$$
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I like that the heating plate has a different (lower) temp than the water so it doesn't burn the coffee AND it shuts off after 40 minutes which is great.. Edit: -1 star - carafe developed a crack at the top of the handle. Replacement is $30 + Shipping which is half the cost of the whole item on Amazon. Not sure what to do.
customer_reviews.author: JKG

customer_reviews.title: great coffee but......
customer_reviews.text: Makes a superb cup of coffee. Very pleased. 11 months later: we've enjoyed great coffee for the past 11 months, but this morning the brewer just didn't work. I don't think that is a very long life for a coffee maker. Because of it's short life, I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jena&amp;amp;#39; Hatchett

customer_reviews.title: but I like this one better
customer_reviews.text: This is as advertised. I have another version of this, with timer etc, but I like this one better. Here the basket sits attached to the coffee maker, rather than resting on the carafe as my other one does. I like pour over coffee, thus this one suits my tastes. Simple, one button functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy D

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had Bonavita coffee makers for over six years. I am on my second machine that I just purchased in May. Last month, in September, it began behaving strangely. It shuts off three times in a brew cycle. I tried making a claim and received no response from the company. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Cold Coffee / Brittle Carafe - Skip it!
customer_reviews.text: The coffee does not come out very hot and gets cold very fast. I have broken THREE carafes - they are expensive and hard to replace - often backordered. The warmer does not stay on for very long... it just decides when you are done wanting hot coffee i guess. It really does not taste better than a cheap mr. coffee. save your money.
customer_reviews.author: smp

customer_reviews.title: good coffee
customer_reviews.text: This makes a great cup of coffee. I like the 8 cup size, but would like an hour instead of 40 minutes of warming. The cup size is normal 6 oz. Some reviews say you must remove the basket to put the lid on the carafe. Not true, it fits fine. And when you forget, it drains through without making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker but has some flaws
customer_reviews.text: The good: Aesthetically pleasing Consistent brewing Easy to use The bad: grinds get stuck on shower head grinds sometime get in the carafe the carafe is very fragile
customer_reviews.author: Superboy

customer_reviews.title: Hot plate timer is too short
customer_reviews.text: This replaces an older Bonavita that was made with BPA plastics. I’d otherwise still use the older model as it still worked. This new machine works great. One star removed because the warming plate shuts down too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hannifin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brew
customer_reviews.text: The best coffee maker of its type (automatic) I’ve ever had. Must be due to the “shower head” water system. Would have preferred a heavier glass carafe. Easily broken, had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: The infusion mode makes the coffee less bitter
customer_reviews.text: I tried it with the infusion mode turned off and then turned on. With it turned on, the coffee was less bitter. I've also found that I can cheat and leave the carafe cover on (don't try this at home, haha) and it will keep the coffee hotter right from the start. The only problem is that I have big fat hands, so cleaning the carafe was a problem until I bought a brush to swirl around the inside.
customer_reviews.author: dwd999

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm changing my review. I can not recommend this machine due to the flimsy carafe. Can't find replacement because of the SPECIAL size of the heating plate. Factory ones are silly outrageous price.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Gold standard coffee
customer_reviews.text: I just couldn’t spend $319 usd on a drip coffee maker. The Bonavita Metropolitan provides coffee quality on par for with a well know European manufacturer for a third of the cost. Full body coffee, pre infusion, perfect brewing temp, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Maker
customer_reviews.text: Best one ever. I always admired the coffee at my brother's house and finally asked what brand of coffee maker he uses. I knew I had to have one. It did not disappoint! My husband and I love this coffee pot.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkler water temperature too hot.
customer_reviews.text: Coffee tastes burnt and bitter. Water temp is over 207 degrees F measured in the basket through the steam vents sluts. I am returning this and reorder another one next January, 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A. Seneris

customer_reviews.title: The BEST coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to myself and I would buy it over and over again! My coffee is always piping hot and taste so smooth every time! The price was fantastic and the two day shipping is always a perk!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Marr

product_meta.title: Bonavita BV1901PW Metropolitan One-Touch Coffee Brewer, Length: 12.60" Width: 6.80" Height: 12.20", Black
product_meta.description: 8 cup | sleek Black design | one-touch - with a Bonavita Coffee brewer, you're just one press of a button away from a perfect cup of coffee. Independently tested, the Metropolitan brews coffee to Golden Cup Standard, when following our recommended brewing instructions, and offers our most accessible price point.
feature_bullets: One-touch brewing with sleek black design
Optional pre-infusion mode saturates freshly roasted ground coffee to optimize flavor while the showerhead is specifically designed to facilitate even saturation of coffee grounds
Powerful 1560-watt heater with advanced heating control quickly brings water to ideal brewing temperature of 198° to 205°F (92°- 96°C)
Removable flat bottom filter basket and larger showerhead provide better saturation and uniform flavor extraction
Audible signal alerts user when the filter basket has finished draining and coffee is ready
Tempered glass carafe design help retain heat and warming plate shuts off after 40 minutes and is easy to clean
Brewer might be noisy when used at higher altitudes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars274 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
